original_text: They kept us safe while we took care of Nabal's sheep. They kept us safe all the time, during the day and at night.
korean_text: 우리가 양을 지키는 동안에 그들이 우리와 함께 있어 밤낮 우리에게 담이 되었음이라

sentences.original_text: while we took care of Nabal's sheep
They kept us safe all the time
during the day and at night
